n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value columnwise:"))
}
c=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number ofcolumns"))
mat=matrix(arr,ncol=c)
mat[,c(1,c)]=mat[,c(c,1)]
print(mat)
